text.__SUMMARY__: Psychotria waasii is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Sri Lanka.
text.Sources: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Psychotria waasii". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T38031A10094097. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T38031A10094097.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
